scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:kyc && npm run build:amount && npm run build:sanctions
scripts.setup:kyc: snarkjs groth16 setup build/kyc.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_12_final.ptau build/kyc_0000.zkey
scripts.setup:amount: snarkjs groth16 setup build/amount.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_12_final.ptau build/amount_0000.zkey
scripts.setup:sanctions: snarkjs groth16 setup build/sanctions.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_12_final.ptau build/sanctions_0000.zkey
scripts.setup: npm run setup:kyc && npm run setup:amount && npm run setup:sanctions
scripts.contribute:kyc: snarkjs zkey contribute build/kyc_0000.zkey build/kyc_0001.zkey --name="ShadowBridge KYC" -v -e="test"
scripts.contribute:amount: snarkjs zkey contribute build/amount_0000.zkey build/amount_0001.zkey --name="ShadowBridge Amount" -v -e="test"
scripts.contribute:sanctions: snarkjs zkey contribute build/sanctions_0000.zkey build/sanctions_0001.zkey --name="ShadowBridge Sanctions" -v -e="test"
scripts.contribute: npm run contribute:kyc && npm run contribute:amount && npm run contribute:sanctions
scripts.export:kyc: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/kyc_0001.zkey build/kyc_verification_key.json && cp build/kyc_0001.zkey build/kyc_final.zkey
scripts.export:amount: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/amount_0001.zkey build/amount_verification_key.json && cp build/amount_0001.zkey build/amount_final.zkey
scripts.export:sanctions: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/sanctions_0001.zkey build/sanctions_verification_key.json && cp build/sanctions_0001.zkey build/sanctions_final.zkey
scripts.export: npm run export:kyc && npm run export:amount && npm run export:sanctions
scripts.finalize: npm run contribute && npm run export
scripts.prove:kyc: snarkjs groth16 prove build/kyc_final.zkey build/kyc.wtns build/kyc_proof.json build/kyc_public.json
scripts.prove:amount: snarkjs groth16 prove build/amount_final.zkey build/amount.wtns build/amount_proof.json build/amount_public.json
scripts.prove:sanctions: snarkjs groth16 prove build/sanctions_final.zkey build/sanctions.wtns build/sanctions_proof.json build/sanctions_public.json
scripts.verify:kyc: snarkjs groth16 verify build/kyc_verification_key.json build/kyc_public.json build/kyc_proof.json
scripts.verify:amount: snarkjs groth16 verify build/amount_verification_key.json build/amount_public.json build/amount_proof.json
scripts.verify:sanctions: snarkjs groth16 verify build/sanctions_verification_key.json build/sanctions_public.json build/sanctions_proof.json
